title: Doner Bowl
instructions: Season planted with döner spices (cumin, coriander, paprika, garlic, oregano). Sauté in olive oil over high heat until crispy and charred, about 5-6 minutes.
Cook rice or prepare warm flatbread as the base for your bowl.
Prepare fresh salad: shred red cabbage, slice tomatoes and cucumbers, and chop fresh lettuce.
Make garlic yogurt sauce by mixing yogurt with minced garlic, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt.
Assemble bowls: layer rice, fresh salad, and the spiced planted.
Drizzle generously with garlic sauce and hot sauce, top with pickled vegetables and fresh herbs.
